text: Euphorbia pachysantha is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar Category:Least concern plants pachysantha Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon
title: Euphorbia pachysantha
